name: Extreme Car Drift Rival
description:
You just get ready to drive high performance 4x4 turbo cars to make top quality drifts at high speed on tracks designed for drift racing, with a wide range of racing cars all ready for drift race and a number of race tracks to compete on this stylish and exciting drift race game. Everybody will surely love to play for hours and hours but you have to be very trained racing car driver to make real drift car racing and blow off the engine valve with full spirit and courage.

Game Features
1. Amazing gameplay and graphics
2. Super challenging levels
3. Many cars to drive
4. Addictive drifting game
